Primary Energy: Air 4 (destructive sonic vibration) Supporting Energy: Space 3 (medium range + 10ft radius) Range: Medium, 60 ft. (10-foot radius sphere) Duration: Instantaneous Total Cost: 7 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Air Potential + Air Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery Effect: Create sudden loud ringing in 10-foot radius sphere. All creatures in area take [[/damage 16 type=thunder]] damage. Creatures make Fortitude saves to reduce damage. Nonmagical objects made of crystal, glass, or similar material take double damage and shatter if reduced to 0 HP. Applies Effects: deafened Saving Throw: Fortitude (to resist sonic vibration) Damage Type: Thunder (sonic energy) DR Interaction: Full DR applies ([[/damage 16 type=thunder]] damage vs DR 4 becomes 16 - 4 = [[/damage 12]] damage) Success Scaling: 0 = half damage (8), 1 = 3/[[/damage 4]] damage (12), 2 = full damage (16), 3 = +[[/damage 8]] damage (24 total) + Deafened, 4 = +[[/damage 16]] damage (32 total) + Deafened + Dazed, 5 = +[[/damage 24]] damage (40 total) + Deafened + Dazed + Stunned Deafened Condition (at Net 3+): Target is Deafened for 1 minute (can save at end of each turn, 1 success ends).
